panels.title: [METRICS] API proxy, /api/prom/push, POST requests, rate by status code, (5m mean) ALL tenants
[LOGS] API proxy /loki/api/v1/push, POSTs, rate by status code (5m mean) ALL tenants
[METRICS] API proxy, /api/prom/push, POST requests, rate by status code, (5m mean) BY tenants

targets.expr: sum by (job, status_code) (rate(cortex_api_proxy_request_duration_seconds_count{method="GET", route=~"api_v1_query.*"}[5m])) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: [METRICS] API proxy /api/v1/query[_range], GETs, rate (5m mean) ALL tenants

targets.expr: sum by (job, status_code) (rate(loki_api_proxy_request_duration_seconds_count{method="GET", route=~"loki_api_v1_query.*|loki_api_v1_tail"}[5m])) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: [LOGS] API proxy /api/v1/query[_range], GETs, rate (5m mean) ALL tenants
Queries through Grafana, request duration (5m mean) by namespace, status code

panels.description: ACTIVE state uses `min` whereas non-ACTIVE states use `max`; see queries for details.
panels.title: [METRICS] Ring state seen by service

panels.description: ACTIVE state uses `min` whereas non-ACTIVE states use `max`; see queries for details.
panels.title: [LOGS] Ring state seen by service

targets.expr:
(
  sum by (persistentvolumeclaim) (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{cluster="", job="kubelet", namespace="cortex"})
  -
  sum by (persistentvolumeclaim) (kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{cluster="", job="kubelet", namespace="cortex"})
)
/
sum by (persistentvolumeclaim) (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{cluster="", job="kubelet", namespace="cortex"})

(
  sum by (persistentvolumeclaim) (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{cluster="", job="kubelet", namespace="loki"})
  -
  sum by (persistentvolumeclaim) (kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{cluster="", job="kubelet", namespace="loki"})
)
/
sum by (persistentvolumeclaim) (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{cluster="", job="kubelet", namespace="loki"})
